name: RAMnesia
description:
As you move deeper through the woods, your amnesia runs worse and worse; But your character’s memory isn’t the only memory being forgotten.

RAMnesia is a puzzle platformer, where if a variable in the game’s memory has been untouched for 3 seconds, it gets erased.

This is a puzzle game with a unique mechanic, so it might take a bit of time to figure out.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48.

If you plan on leaving a comment, please do so on the Ludum Dare page.

RAMnesia
